org.restsql.core.sqlresource

Class SqlResourceDefinitionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restsql.core.sqlresource.SqlResourceDefinitionUtils

  • public class SqlResourceDefinitionUtils
extends Object
    Contains utilities to process definitions.
    Author:
    Mark Sawers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SqlResourceDefinitionUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getDefaultDatabase(SqlResourceDefinition definition)
      Returns default database.
      static Table getTable(SqlResourceDefinition definition, ColumnMetaData column)
      Returns table object for column, ignoring case.
      static Table getTable(SqlResourceDefinition definition, String tableName)
      Returns table object with specified table name, ignoring case.

      Returns table object with desired role.
      static List<Table> getTableList(SqlResourceDefinition definition, TableMetaData.TableRole role)
      Returns list of table objects with specified role.
      static void validate(SqlResourceDefinition definition)
      Throws SqlResourceException if definition meets one of the following criteria: No query element No metadata element No database element with default database name No Parent table element More than one Parent, Child or Join table elements

    • Constructor Detail

      • SqlResourceDefinitionUtils

        public SqlResourceDefinitionUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultDatabase

        public static String getDefaultDatabase(SqlResourceDefinition definition)
        Returns default database.

      • getTable

        public static Table getTable(SqlResourceDefinition definition,
             ColumnMetaData column)
        Returns table object for column, ignoring case. Uses qualified name first, then unqualified.

      • getTable

        public static Table getTable(SqlResourceDefinition definition,
             String tableName)
        Returns table object with specified table name, ignoring case. If the qualified name doesn't exist, finds table by unqualified name.

      • getTable

        public static Table getTable(SqlResourceDefinition definition,
             TableMetaData.TableRole role)
        Returns table object with desired role. If there are multiple, returns first one.

      • getTableList

        public static List<Table> getTableList(SqlResourceDefinition definition,
                       TableMetaData.TableRole role)
        Returns list of table objects with specified role.

      • validate

        public static void validate(SqlResourceDefinition definition)
                     throws SqlResourceException
        Throws SqlResourceException if definition meets one of the following criteria:
        1. No query element
        2. No metadata element
        3. No database element with default database name
        4. No Parent table element
        5. More than one Parent, Child or Join table elements
        Parameters:
        definition - definition
        Throws:
        SqlResourceException - if definition is invalid
